title: Teamfights
body:
My team during a team fight
http://s3media.247sports.com/Uploads/Assets/954/486/486954.gif

Their team during a team fight
https://metrouk2.files.wordpress.com/2014/11/300-fight-scene.gif

replies.body: So your entire team turns into Zac and their team turns into all Pantheon? How do you pull that off? Isn't all for one disabled?

> [{quoted}](name=CannonLordFreed,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=iA5W7wrI,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-07-21T04:55:56.374+0000)
>
> So your entire team turns into Zac and their team turns into all Pantheon? How do you pull that off? Isn't all for one disabled?

My team is derp and theirs are in perfect unison :P

> [{quoted}](name=Frigid Ice Storm,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=iA5W7wrI,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-07-21T04:56:46.673+0000)
>
> My team is derp and theirs are in perfect unison :P

I know what you meant, I just found my comment amusing. It's much less funny when I have to explain this...

> [{quoted}](name=CannonLordFreed,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=iA5W7wrI,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2015-07-21T05:00:01.721+0000)
>
> I know what you meant, I just found my comment amusing. It's much less funny when I have to explain this...

Sorry its my first time doing memes haha, my friend got me into it
who is this friend. was i ur inspiration.

> [{quoted}](name=aaronautumn,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=iA5W7wrI,comment-id=00000000000000000000,timestamp=2015-07-21T05:01:22.690+0000)
>
> who is this friend. was i ur inspiration.

No :P. Just my friend who would spam links to different memes on the general discussions boards. I thought they were really funny so I thought I'd try to make some :D
To be fair, those idiots are bouncing in pretty decent sync.
you know, Those balls look pretty indestructible, I take your team any day.
